dmca.title: copyright violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Ahsan F [mailto:cheenamalai@msn.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, May 16, 2007 4:16 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: copyright violation


The person hosting www.mydesionline.org is violating terms and services 
directing the policy of copyright materials. The website hosts illegal
media 
files protected by Sony TV, Zee TV and other television channels in
India. 
What is the policy regarding this?

Violations can be seen here

http://www.mydesionline.org/forumdisplay.php?f=199
http://www.mydesionline.org/forumdisplay.php?f=252

And majority of the forum. If its not on your server do you allow
copyright 
materials to link to other servers?

Thanks.

_________________________________________________________________
Make every IM count. Download Messenger and join the i'm Initiative now.

It's free. http://im.live.com/messenger/im/home/?source=TAGHM_MAY07
